title: Message on the Work of St. John's Guild, New York City, at Seaside Hospital for Needy Children.
text:
BOTH personally and as Honorary Chairman of the American Child Health Association it is a pleasure to most cordially wish you every success in the new season's work at Seaside Hospital which so effectively serves the needy children of New York.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [W. W. Mayers, St. John's Guild, 1 East 42nd Street, New York City]
